name: Nicklas Ackeklint
description: Super nice treatment on the phone and on site. The result exceeded expectations considering what was included in what I bought and that the car has a lot of small scratches from machine washes

name: Philip-Jan Flebus
description: What an amazing job they did! Very nice and professional treatment. I left an old worn out car and got back a new one it feels like. I didn't recognize the car when I went to pick it up. Will definitely come back. The pictures were taken just before and after Helrekond.

name: Håkan Zachrisson
description:
Saw an offer on Facebook, registered my interest, they called the same day, made an appointment. Picked up a super nice new car. Shiny nice car with interior like when it was new.
Thanks for a nice job.
Håkan

name: Assqar ayobi
description: Fantastic results and top-class service! I brought the car in for a reconditioning and am incredibly happy with the result – it really looks like new again! The service was also very professional and friendly. It is obvious that they take great pride in their work and really care about their customers. Highly recommended to anyone who wants to give their car a new lease of life. Thank you for an incredibly good job!

name: Robert Ramselid
description: Just picked up my car. Lucky I saw the registration number otherwise I would have thought it was a new car. Can really recommend these guys, very satisfied, good treatment, enthusiastic and explains all treatments. I will go here again
